title: 12/30/21 DPS Hour 2 Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 12/30/21 DPS Hour 2 Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
description:
Reacting to Aaron Rodgers saying that he is not ruling out retirement after this season and will make a fairly quick decision about his future once this season ends, Doug and TJ give their thoughts on what Rodgers said. TJ and Doug have a spirited disagreement about the transfer portal and whether or not it is good for college football. Former Oklahoma State quarterback joins the guys to talk about the transfer portal and players deciding not to play in bowl games. Given the news that Ben Roethlisberger says "all signs are pointing" towards Monday's game being his last one at Heinz Field, TJ talks about playing against Big Ben and what his legacy will be.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
